timeline.bodyText: The PR labels include 7.9.0 but this seems to exclude < v8.0.0. Kibana would benefit a lot from this if it was available in 7.x could this be backported?

replies.bodyText: These conditions are typically adjusted after backporting the PR (as it otherwise breaks CI when merging into master and running BWC mixed-version cluster tests). No need to worry.
